entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
